mapper.insert: insert into ALBUM (title, content, writer, location, startdate, enddate) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{location}, #{startDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate, jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: select count(*) from ALBUM where ano>0
mapper.update: update ALBUM set location=#{location}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, startdate=#{startDate, jdbcType=DATE}, enddate=#{endDate, jdbcType=DATE}, updatedate=current_timestamp where ano=#{ano}
update ALBUM set hit=(hit+1) where ano=#{ano}
update ALBUM set replycnt=replycnt+#{amount} where ano=#{ano}
